Reviews.Title: Complain
Reviews.Author: Md Chowdhury
Reviews.Content: Hi, I bought this unlock GSM phone and I send in Bangladesh but it is not working. When I put sim but this phone can't found any network, I am so shocked and nervous for this. So now what can I do about this phone? Here is the link Nokia Asha 306 Unlocked GSM Quad-Band Phone with Touchscreen and 2 MP Camera - No Warranty - Dark Grey

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Ellen Cohl
Reviews.Content: I took the phone overseas with me, without testing it.  Regretfully, I was not able to get any signal.It was not an issue of it being locked or being in a wrong frequency region.It seems may an antenna issue like others have mentioned in reviews here.

Reviews.Title: I just don' like the service.
Reviews.Author: adelis aular
Reviews.Content: You just deserve a star because knowing that phone had destined to Venezuela, was released for just two operators (Movilnet and Movistar). even though in saying desripcion for four; obvious that Venezuela only works with three the previous two digitel

Reviews.Title: Needs Activation to work
Reviews.Author: irene gold
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of this Nokia Asha phone sent it to my siblings in Africa as a gifts but to my surprised the phones didn't work. They took it to phone retailer for 2days now but still they ve not be able to activate both phones'

Reviews.Title: Warning
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I purchase the Nokia asha 306 ,To use in Costa Rica Central AmericaAnd insert the prepay SIM card no problemThe only BIG problem is , this Nokia is a 2GNo service any Anywhere.Don't go by box info is not a good phone is onlyA old 2G phone.Don't buy it !

Reviews.Title: It's garbage
Reviews.Author: Ling Xie "Aris"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because I used lots of Nokia's phones and all of them worked quite well. As a phone, this one works also well, but it's only working as a basic phone. When I first received it, there's no data cable in the box that I couldn't connect the phone with my computer to transfer the data. Thanks for Amazon to replace another one but still, no cable inside. I have to buy one to transfer the vedio and pictures I took with this phone. Then I found I can't access internet. Even the Wi-Fi connection showed the phone was connected with my home WI-FI, when I clicked the browser, the web said connection error. The next thing is Bluetooth. I connected this phone to my car and the bluetooth signal showed full. Again, that's not true. I can't make or receive any phone call through my car's bluetooth which works on my Nokia N8 and motorola phone. Recently this phone couldn't display some of the messages and gave me a multimedia error.If you only need a phone to talk with, this one is good. If you want to use other functions, it's useless. It's not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked GSM bought unlocked
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Kemokai
Reviews.Content: I had bought the phone for my son. On receiving it, I had it send to him in South Africa. He placed his sim in its slot and found that it was not working. The massage on the screen was, "Not registered to network". This is certainly not what I had paid for. I am stuck with it here in Haiti and can do nothing with it.

Reviews.Title: completely dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: Received this so call "asha 306" with a broken antenna and no signal at all. RMAed it with  the seller(mobile city online) and they destroyed the phone and send it back to me stating it was physical damaged by my end. My recommendation stay away from this model and seller mobile city online otherwise you will waste the 120$ on a completely useless piece of crap phone. Nokia is decaying seriously with this kind of products as well.What a waste of time and money and customer service for both companies is deplorable :(

Reviews.Title: cannot complain
Reviews.Author: William
Reviews.Content: got mine, works fine, my sister keeps borrowing it, and she likes it too, lol, but yes, i would get one again

Reviews.Title: nokia is still the best.
Reviews.Author: noel hobson
Reviews.Content: nokia is still d best make phone. my c3 got run over by a cart/mule n it still works i just change the screen u now need an Android.

Reviews.Title: nokia asha 306
Reviews.Author: aaehlmopstu
Reviews.Content: i have only used it for just a few minutes so i can't say much about it.  seems to work good.  has all the features that i need.  loudspeaker not much to rave about.

Reviews.Title: A mobile phone i'will not advise you to buy
Reviews.Author: Leopold Ndongo
Reviews.Content: I've purchase this Nokia Asha 306 as a "GIFT"..., during my visit on September 2013 In USA. Coming back home in Africa ( Douala-cameroon) I've offered this to my girl friend, After a week of using the touchscreen doesn't work properly, and time to time this fone were missing and loosing the local network signal. Poor communication whenever you need to call or receive a call... Most of the capabilities do not work properly, and make me disapointed about this product.......Unfortunatly i'm already far away from Us and no way to claim the reimbursmentMy Advise to any Customer it's: Don't buy that product to avoid facing the same disapointment

Reviews.Title: Nokia Asha 306
Reviews.Author: Calvert Harrison
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my 13 year old son. Other than the fact that it shows that I am connected to my WiFi but I cannot access the internet and the touch response is slow he said it is a kool phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Victor Lugo
Reviews.Content: Item arrived very original unopened packaging in demonstrating that a seller is reliable and that is a quality article. I am always happy to receive an item that has not been uncovered that shows that what I'm buying this brand new. I've had some cases where the item comes with the security seal broken and so sometimes I give 3 stars. Recommended to all buyers looking for a great price and a high level of service. thanks

Reviews.Title: The best on its class, Nokia Asha 306
Reviews.Author: Buyer
Reviews.Content: The best on its class, Nokia Asha 306 and I have used nokia asha in the past but this new phone something else.I give 10 out of 10.
